description: As others mentioned, it crashes after login. The crash is caused by an error calling openSSL to generate a root certificate. The error message - Error generating rootCA certificate for HTTPS proxy

Solution:
https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-app-support/issues/12330
opening and closing
every OS has its flaws and while this is frustrating, it beats what I have to deal with on Windows 11 so there's that

If it doesn't start and output mentions 
.var/app/com.getpostman.Postman/config/Postman/proxy/postman-proxy-ca.crt

Use steps from https://github.com/postmanlabs/postman-app-support/issues/12330

1) cd ~/.var/app/com.getpostman.Postman/config/Postman/proxy
2) openssl req -subj '/C=US/CN=Postman Proxy' -new -newkey rsa:2048 -sha256 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout postman-proxy-ca.key -out postman-proxy-ca.crt
Working with fedora 40 and Gnome 46. Postman not even open the windows. No documentation to fix the issue...

If you are experiencing a crash everytime you try to open up postman, try these steps below:

cd ~/.var/app/com.getpostman.Postman/config/Postman/proxy

openssl req -subj '/C=US/CN=Postman Proxy' -new -newkey rsa:2048 -sha256 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout postman-proxy-ca.key -out postman-proxy-ca.crt

Fedora 40 Workstation Edition here. After install, Postman crashes after start. I have applied the fix mentioned in one of the previous comments and it starts working. It's a cert issue. I copy here the fix that worked for me, as posted by another user previous to me. Thanks to original user.

$ cd ~/.var/app/com.getpostman.Postman/config/Postman/proxy
$ openssl req -subj '/C=US/CN=Postman Proxy' -new -newkey rsa:2048 -sha256 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout postman-proxy-ca.key -out postman-proxy-ca.crt

The Flatpack version has an issue with SSL certificates. If the app crashes after start, run the following:

cd ~/.var/app/com.getpostman.Postman/config/Postman/proxy/ 

openssl req -subj '/C=US/CN=Postman Proxy' -new -newkey rsa:2048 -sha256 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout postman-proxy-ca.key -out postman-proxy-ca.crt

description: Скачал приложение, предложило авторизоваться, авторизовался и оно теперь открывается с белым фоном и закрывается почти сразу
Почините уже приложение, похоже, что краш при запусе - общая проблема, пользоваться невозможно. Пробовал снести рабочий каталог - доходит до авторизации, после чего снова крашится.
Работать невозможно.

Погуглите в интернете решение, там буквально одна команда после установки решит проблему с закрываниями после авторизации. Мне помогла такая: 

openssl req -subj '/C=US/CN=Postman Proxy' -new -newkey rsa:2048 -sha256 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout ~/.var/app/com.getpostman.Postman/config/Postman/proxy/postman-proxy-ca.key -out ~/.var/app/com.getpostman.Postman/config/Postman/proxy/postman-proxy-ca.crt
